Async Tests: Tests running in a async server¶

The basic async tests in a async server.

Test Async¶

Run all async tests in a async server.

Cases¶

class test.test_async.TestServerAsync[source]¶

Async server for running async tests.

test_module_loading_handler()[source]¶

Test modules.get_ui_modules in a async server.

Note

The case create test/loading_test.html and module/test.py during testing and would overwrite the cont- ent if files already exist.
